scripts.deva: ./node_modules/.bin/dotenv -e ./.env-dev -- docker compose -p efg-dev -f docker-compose-dev.yml up --force-recreate --build --attach api --attach dash --attach front --attach bot_rest-proxy --attach bot_gateway --attach bot_event-handler --attach bot_sender
scripts.db: cd ./api/ && yarn dotenv -v DATABASE_URL=mysql://root:secret@localhost:3306/efg yarn prisma studio
scripts.dbpush: cd ./api/ && yarn dotenv -v DATABASE_URL=mysql://root:secret@localhost:3306/efg yarn prisma db push
scripts.dbreset: cd ./api/ && yarn dotenv -v DATABASE_URL=mysql://root:secret@localhost:3306/efg yarn prisma migrate reset && cd ../ && yarn dbpush
